summary: Fixes the annoying clipping of the Aetherial Crown with the hood of a female version of Archmage's Robes.
descriptionHtml:
I was greatly annoyed when I found out that my favorite combo of Aetherial Crown + Archmage's Robes has the crown clipping through the back of the hood of a female version of the robes. After playing around with NifSkope a little I came up with this mod.

Install
Just unzip in your data folder

Uninstall
Remove /Data/meshes/dlc01/armor/circlets/circletfcrystal.nif

Compatibility
This mod is incompatible with any mod that changes the mesh of a female version of Aetherial Crown (the .nif file mentioned above)
author: Vazgen
